sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RANDIER, a town of Hindustan, in the province of Gujerat, and district of Broach, which is said to have been in ancient times a large city. It is situated opposite to Surat, on the north side of the Tuptee river. Long. 73. 3. E. Lat. 21. 16. N.
